metadata.name: Azure Active Directory Hybrid Health AD FS Service Delete
metadata.comment: This detection uses azureactivity logs (Administrative category) to identify the deletion of an Azure AD Hybrid health AD FS service instance in a tenant. A threat actor can create a new AD Health ADFS service and create a fake server to spoof AD FS signing logs. The health AD FS service can then be deleted after it is not longer needed via HTTP requests to Azure.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM entity_management WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 4 AND lower(entity.type) = lower('administrative') AND lower(cloud.provider) = lower('microsoft.adhybridhealthservice') AND contains(lower(entity.uid), lower('adfederationservice')) AND lower(api.operation) = lower('microsoft.adhybridhealthservice/services/delete'))
